title: Creative Cloud & Stack Desktop app developer
snippet:
I'm looking for one or more programmers for a mid- to long-term contract with the possibility of ongoing work. zenColor owns the patents on certain color normalization technologies and one of the projects we're working on is a design tool. 

We're looking for people with experience in one or more of the following technologies:
    Angular 2 (late beta or release)
    Adobe Extendscript
    Adobe Creative Cloud extension building
    Full Stack (HTML5/JS/CSS) desktop application programming
We need someone who can take well-defined operations and implement them. The time frame is immediate and the developer can work remotely.

In order to properly vet any potential programmers, we have a small test that should take an hour or two at the most. Using the technologies above, either describe the technical steps or write a small app to grab a single color off of an image. The image can be loaded into the app or can exist in a different program. An example of the functionality can be found here:
    http://www.imagecolorpicker.com
This is a test of your knowledge of the functionality and how the app looks does not matter. A working, clunky app is a success for this test. If it takes more than an hour or two, you're on the wrong track.

You can send your resume and test results to md@zencolor.com. I'll also need your rate and when you can be available to start. 

Thanks
Michael Dinowitz
CTO - zenColor.com
